post.summary:
Retrieves GlobalTenantId(GTID) from AgencyDB. If it does not exist in the DB then calls GlobalTenantId service to fetch the GTID.
The GTID is saved in Agency DB so further calls will just return the value from DB. 
The value is saved in the DB only for agencies with version 18.1 and above.

parameters.name: GlobalTenantIdPostRequest
parameters.description: Model contains the data required to fetch the GTID

post.description:
Retrieves GlobalTenantId(GTID) from AgencyDB. If it does not exist in the DB then calls GlobalTenantId service to fetch the GTID based on 
following parameters
    1. AMSCustId
    2. AgencyNo (InstanceId)
    3. ApplicationId
The GTID is saved in Agency DB so further calls will just return the value from DB. 
The value is saved in the DB only for agencies with version 18.1 and above.

parameters.name: String
parameters.description: The data required to fetch the GTID

post.summary:
The *new* first endpoint an EMS External User needs to hit to be authenticated
Gets a temporary loginKey when provided an applicationKey from an EMS External User. 
The temporary loginKey is returned for use in a subsequent request to retrieve an accessToken.

parameters.description: The secret app key that is configured in ACC for use by integrating applications requiring access to EMS.

post.summary:
An endpoint that takes application's login credentials for validation.

parameters.description: A LoginRequestModel containing the login credentials to be validated

get.summary:
Endpoint used to "refresh" access tokens

get.summary:
The first endpoint an EMS External User needs to hit to be authenticated
Gets an EMSLoginGuid when provided a secret key from an EMS External User. 
The EMSLoginGuid is returned to for use with LoginAsUser

The second endpoint an EMS External User needs to hit to be authenticated
Returns a JWT access token and refresh token for the external user to use in future requests
Endpoint is used for both Native and VSSO authentication

This controller is Anonymous because it is called by ONS which has not specific Agency or user context.
The context must be figured out later like the IVANS calls do.

Note: There is a special URI "https://ams360.local.vertafore.com/ems/notification/Test" for testing.
Do Not Use for real calls
